title: Feds greenlight $2B pumped storage project on Yakama Nation sacred site
description: Federal energy regulators approved a $2 billion renewable energy project on Yakama Nation sacred land in Klickitat County, despite legal challenges.
content: Federal energy regulators approved a $2 billion renewable energy project on Yakama Nation sacred land in Klickitat County, despite legal challenges.
